mapper.select: select m.id,`code`,`name`,link from notesnic_admin_menu m inner join ( select substring_index(substring_index(r.role,',',b.help_topic_id+1),',',-1)id from notesnic_admin_role r join mysql.help_topic b on b.help_topic_id <(length(r.role) - length(replace(r.role,',',''))+1) where r.id= #{id} )a on a.id=m.id where m.level =1 order by m.id asc

select m.id,`code`,`name`,link from notesnic_admin_menu m inner join ( select substring_index(substring_index(r.role,',',b.help_topic_id+1),',',-1)id from notesnic_admin_role r join mysql.help_topic b on b.help_topic_id <(length(r.role) - length(replace(r.role,',',''))+1) where r.id= #{id} )a on a.id=m.id where m.level =2 and m.menuid=#{menuid} order by m.sort asc
select id,`code`,`name`,link from notesnic_admin_menu where `level`in (1) order by sort asc
select id,`name`,link from notesnic_admin_menu where `level`=2 and menuid=#{0} order by sort asc
select menuid from notesnic_admin_menu where id=#{0}
